00077 
00078 bool CodeWord::Match(Pixel* p, int frame, double t_cd, double alpha, double beta, int minAge) {
00079         int i_2 = (p->R*p->R+p->G*p->G+p->B*p->B); 
00080         int i = p->R+p->G+p->B;
00081         double d = (R*p->R+G*p->G+B*p->B);
00082         // color distortion
00083         if (abs(i_2 - d*d/(R*R+G*G+B*B+1)) > t_cd*t_cd) 
00084                 return false;
00085         
00086         // brightness distortion
00087         if (i < alpha*i_max || i > min(beta*i_max, i_min/alpha))
00088                 return false;
00089 
00090         return true;
00091 }
00092 
00093 void CodeWord::Update(Pixel* p, int frame) {            
00094         R = (age*R+p->R)/(age+1);
00095         G = (age*G+p->G)/(age+1);
00096         B = (age*B+p->B)/(age+1);
00097         i_min = min(p->R+p->G+p->B, i_min);
00098         i_max = max(p->R+p->G+p->B, i_max);
00099         age = age + 1;
00100         stale = max(stale, frame - last);
00101         last = frame;
00102 }
00103 
00104 void CodeWord::Serialize( CArchive& archive ) {
00105         CObject::Serialize( archive );
00106         if( archive.IsStoring() )
00107             archive << R << G << B << i_min << i_max << age << stale << first << last;
00108         else 
00109                 archive >> R >> G >> B >> i_min >> i_max >> age >> stale >> first >> last;
00110 }

00113 template <> void AFXAPI SerializeElements <CodeWord> ( CArchive& ar, CodeWord* p, INT_PTR nCount )
00114 {
00115     for ( int i = 0; i < nCount; i++, p++ )
00116         p->Serialize( ar );
